title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 339.4 - Availability of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 339.4 - Availability of records

State Regulations

In addition to being available by mail, records shall
also be made available by appointment at the main office of the department, which is located at: 40 North Pearl Street, Albany, NY 12243. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
339.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
